participant_2.background:
I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place.
My biggest challenge is balancing my social life with my work and family.
I started playing recreational baseball more often and even took lessons to improve my skills.
I am close to my family, but I sometimes have to spend time alone to recharge.
i am a morning person.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do in your free time?
Hi! I like to spend time with my family and friends, and I also like to play recreational baseball.
I like to spend time with my family and friends too! I also like to play sports, especially football.
That's cool! Do you play any other sports?
I used to play soccer, but I don't play it anymore.
I used to play soccer too! But I stopped playing because I didn't have enough time.
I understand. It's hard to find time to play sports when you have a busy schedule.
Yeah, it is. But I still try to make time to play sports because it's a good way to stay active and healthy.
I agree. I think sports are a great way to stay in shape and have fun.
Me too! Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to go to karaoke with my friends and sing songs from my childhood. I also enjoy spending time outdoors, either riding my bike or playing with my dogs.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to karaoke, but it sounds like it would be a good time. I also like to spend time outdoors, especially hiking.
I love hiking! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
Yeah, it is! I'm glad we have some things in common.
Me too! I think we'd make great friends.
I think so too! I'd love to hang out with you sometime.
